metadata.synopsis: A goblin raider celebrates upon having successfully destroyed a shelter full of refugees. Jubilant and nasty.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. oe readyattackonden4. Blow the horn and side wit the goblin (kill all tieflings at the gate).5. goto 175.70, 21.56, 529.966. Kill all tieflings.7. goto 258.42, 14.76, 525.528. Kill all druids.9. Follow the goblins to 285.38, 1.25, 470.3310. Talk with Goblin Sharp-eye

0.speaker: Goblin Sharp-Eye
0.text: I see a lot o' red blades around; the Absolute'll be chuffed.

1.speaker: Goblin Sharp-Eye
1.text: That's the last of 'em! Ground's sopping with heretic blood!
